name: Street Kart - The Original Multiplayer Kart Racing Game!
blurb: Imagine racing an entire career in multiplayer against real life racers? Then come check us out!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Show your support for the game even if you're broke! :) We'll give you 3 new helmet unlocks that non-kickstarters won't have, just because we're cool like that!

Get access to the game and play with founding member status as a thanks for helping us get the game out. We'll give you the SK founding member icon next to your name. Icon is visible during the race and in race preparation mode. If we go beyond \u00a330,000 ($50,000) we'll give you access to more helmets and the SK SUPER SOFT tyre.
In addition to all the cool things as the \u00a35 REWARD but we've now a further 3 NEW HELMETS AND DOUBLE THE STARTING CURRENCY, to get your through the early stages of the game quicker!

Same as \u00a335 reward - just limited to 25 people! But for Entry into the SK KARTERS LEAGUE, SK (just for real life karters- we'll want proof before we accept!). Plus rewards \u00a31, \u00a35 and \u00a320! AND AUTHENTIC SK VISOR DECALS to put on your helmet and extra EXCLUSIVE in-game unlocks!

Exclusive SK kickstarter pack of unlocks. We'll organise some great looking suits, helmets, and boots just for supporters on Kickstarter, in addition to founder status rewards. If we go beyond \u00a330,000 ($50,000) we'll give you access to more helmets and the SK SUPER SOFT tyre and Cadet class extra liveries.

Entry into the SK KARTERS LEAGUE (just for real life karters- we'll want proof before we accept!). Plus rewards 1 to 3! Launch in April - ideally sooner! Minimum of 75 members before we launch the league :)

Entry into the SK KARTERS LEAGUE, SK  (just for real life karters- we'll want proof before we accept!). Plus rewards 1 to 4! AND AUTHENTIC SK VISOR DECALS to put on your helmet and extra EXCLUSIVE in-game unlocks!

In addition to rewards 1 to 3, we'll add in new livery for the Monaco Karts and Arrow Karts categories, so if you're a fan of these two classes then this is perfect for you! This will include suits, gloves and boots! If we go beyond \u00a330,000 ($50,000) we'll give you access to more helmets and the SK SUPER SOFT tyre and Cadet class extra liveries and access to a new engine.

In addition to rewards 1 to 3, we'll add in new designs for TKM, Caterham and ZiP class categories, so if you're a fan of these classes then this is perfect for you! This will include suits, gloves and boots! If we go beyond \u00a330,000 ($50,000) we'll give you access to more helmets and the SK SUPER SOFT tyre and KF4 and KF3 class extra liveries and access to a new engine.

Get your own personal HELMET in SK. Plus rewards \u00a31, \u00a315, \u00a320, and \u00a325. i.e. the extra suits and liveries. Only 10 available as this is the steal of the century. Oh, the helmet will have your name on it! On top of that you'll get real life SK Visor Decals send to you and both \u00a340 rewards. Absolute bargain!
Same as reward 7 BUT if you have an iPAD we'll invite you to be a BETA TESTER. PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE IF YOU HAVE AN IPAD! We'll look forward to giving you a first crack at the game!
GREAT REWARD. If you want to rock your kart track we'll send you Street Kart Sticker Set for your Kart, SK league membership, plus all the \u00a340 deals with liveries, suits, helmets available.

Get your 'GOLD' number. We have made this as inexpensive as possible and we think it's a great reward. So on top of founder membership, and, if you're a real life karter, Verification, you'll also get to choose your number (on a first come, first served basis) and keep it in every race. The number will be between 10 and 99. The first person to purchase will get their first option and so on. If we go beyond \u00a330,000 ($50,000) we'll give you access to more helmets and the SK SUPER SOFT tyre and Cadet class extra liveries and access to a new engine.

Want your helmet design in Street Kart? This is the choice for you. 

You'll need to confirm in writing that you have permission from the copyright holder of your helmet design and then we'll make your helmet available in the game.

This is first come, first served, so we'll deliver helmets in order that you sign up!!!!

If we go beyond £30,000 ($50,000) we'll give you access to more helmets and the SK SUPER SOFT tyre and Cadet class extra liveries and access to a new engine. PLEASE NOTE HELMETS WILL BECOME UNLOCKABLE ITEMS IN MOST CASES!

Want your helmet design in Street Kart? This is the choice for you. This reward is for just 75 helmets and you'll get a CREDIT in the game as a thank you!

You'll need to confirm in writing that you have permission from the copyright holder of your helmet design and then we'll make your helmet available in the game.

This is first come, first served, so we'll deliver helmets in order that you sign up!!!!

If we hit our target of being fully funded, we'll add in some additional race suits for you. If we go beyond £30,000 ($50,000) we'll give you access to more helmets and the SK SUPER SOFT tyre and Cadet class extra liveries.PLEASE NOTE HELMETS WILL BECOME UNLOCKABLE ITEMS IN MOST CASES!

We'll name a track layout after you or within reason a person of your choice. So if you're called Steve McQueen, it could be the S McQueen KF4 or McQueen's Cadet Track - no profanity please, and names subject to our approval, We'll also put your helmet in the game, and give you all of the options in the rewards above, including credits in the game (excluding special numbers!) excluding your own race number.

Get your 'GOLD' number from 2-9. We want to make this as inexpensive as possible and we think it's a great reward. So on top of founder membership, and, if you're a real life karter, Verification, you'll also get to choose your number (on a first come, first served basis) and keep it in every race. The first person to purchase will get their first option and so on. You 'll also get all the liveries in earlier rewards and your helmet in the game.

Get your brand in Street Kart. We'll create banners and billboards and you can choose 1 of 7 track locations around the world where we'll add them. Maximum 2 brands per track and choice of location on a first come first served basis. You'll be added to our credit list and we'll have a web link to a website of your choice!

Design your own track which will feature in the game. 

Yes, We'll let you loose on our track editor. Please bear in mind you will need an IPAD, and we'll work with you in January to create a cool track.

Oh, and we'll put in your helmet if you have one.

You'll name the track (which will be in one of 7 locations).

Got a real life track you want featured, we can look at putting it in the game as an unlock or 'extra track' package. Email us team@fezus.com BEFORE you buy this just to make sure we can do everything and actually make the track! Tracks will be made on a first come, first served basis, so we would get some out before the promised May deadline!

Own a kart brand and want to have it modeled for the game? Great! \r\n\r\nWe'll include your kart in whichever kart class you're relevant to. It will be included as an unlockable item in game, complete with your livery. We'll model all the kart handling and the physics to make it real. What better way to promote your kart brand?!
